languages.text: {n}Прежде чем вежливо отвести взгляд, Хейнрикс окидывает вас быстрым взором — в котором, как вы вдруг понимаете, сквозит странная, почти личная заинтригованность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Прежде чем вежливо отвести взгляд, Хейнрикс окидывает вас быстрым взором — в котором, как вы вдруг понимаете, сквозит странная, почти личная заинтригованность.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прежде чем вежливо отвести взгляд, Хейнрикс окидывает вас быстрым взором — в котором, как вы вдруг понимаете, сквозит странная, почти личная заинтригованность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希瞥了你一眼。那一刻，你突然意识到，他的目光中带着古怪的、近乎对你个人的兴趣。随后，他恭敬地移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希瞥了你一眼。那一刻，你突然意识到，他的目光中带着古怪的、近乎对你个人的兴趣。随后，他恭敬地移开了视线。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada. Pronto te das cuenta de que su interés es extrañamente personal. Al poco tiempo aparta la vista por respeto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada. Pronto te das cuenta de que su interés es extrañamente personal. Al poco tiempo aparta la vista por respeto.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたを一瞥する。そしてあなたは不意に気づいたのだ。それが奇妙に、個人的な関心を抱いた視線であることに。彼は、すぐにその視線を外す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたを一瞥する。そしてあなたは不意に気づいたのだ。それが奇妙に、個人的な関心を抱いた視線であることに。彼は、すぐにその視線を外す。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard qui vous semble soudain chargé d'un intérêt étrange, presque personnel. Mais très vite, il détourne les yeux avec déférence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard qui vous semble soudain chargé d'un intérêt étrange, presque personnel. Mais très vite, il détourne les yeux avec déférence.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen kurzen Blick zu und plötzlich wird dir klar, dass es fast so wirkt, als würde er ein persönliches Interesse an dir zeigen – bevor er seinen Blick respektvoll abwendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen kurzen Blick zu und plötzlich wird dir klar, dass es fast so wirkt, als würde er ein persönliches Interesse an dir zeigen – bevor er seinen Blick respektvoll abwendet.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sana aniden tuhaf, hatta neredeyse şahsi bir ilgiyle dolu olduğunu fark ettiğin bir bakış atan Heinrix, saygılı bir şekilde bakışlarını çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cuts you a glance — one which, you suddenly realise, is charged with a strange, almost personal interest — before deferentially averting his gaze.{/n}
